name: Instant Tree Chop
description: A command to chop down trees instantly!

blocks.command: scoreboard objectives add chop minecraft.used:minecraft.diamond_axe
give @p minecraft:diamond_axe[minecraft:custom_data={Chop:1}]

execute as @a at @s[nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:diamond_axe",components:{"minecraft:custom_data":{Chop:1}}}},scores={chop=1..}] at @e[type=item,distance=..8,nbt={Age:0s},sort=nearest,limit=1] run summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {NoGravity:1,Tags:["Treelocation"]}
execute as @e[tag=Treelocation] at @s if block ~ ~1 ~ #minecraft:completes_find_tree_tutorial run tp @s ~ ~1 ~
execute as @e[tag=Treelocation] at @s run fill ~2 ~ ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 air replace #minecraft:completes_find_tree_tutorial destroy
execute as @e[tag=Treelocation] at @s unless block ~ ~1 ~ #minecraft:completes_find_tree_tutorial run kill @s
execute as @a at @s[nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:diamond_axe",components:{"minecraft:custom_dat":{Chop:1}}}},scores={chop=1..}] run scoreboard players reset @s chop

name: Pollen
description: Add pollen to Minecraft so you can enjoy watery eyes without leaving the house!

blocks.command: scoreboard objectives add pollen dummy
scoreboard objectives add pollenLeaves dummy
scoreboard objectives add pollenShortGrass dummy
scoreboard objectives add pollenTallGrass dummy
scoreboard objectives add pollenLeafLitter dummy
execute as @a at @s store success score @s pollenLeaves run clone ~-5 ~-5 ~-5 ~5 ~5 ~5 ~-5 ~-5 ~-5 filtered #minecraft:leaves force
execute as @a at @s store success score @s pollenShortGrass run clone ~-5 ~-5 ~-5 ~5 ~5 ~5 ~-5 ~-5 ~-5 filtered minecraft:short_grass force
execute as @a at @s store success score @s pollenTallGrass run clone ~-5 ~-5 ~-5 ~5 ~5 ~5 ~-5 ~-5 ~-5 filtered minecraft:tall_grass force
execute as @a at @s store success score @s pollenLeafLitter run clone ~-5 ~-5 ~-5 ~5 ~5 ~5 ~-5 ~-5 ~-5 filtered minecraft:leaf_litter force
execute as @a at @s if score @s pollenLeaves matches 1 run scoreboard players set @s pollen 1
execute as @a at @s if score @s pollenShortGrass matches 1 run scoreboard players set @s pollen 1
execute as @a at @s if score @s pollenTallGrass matches 1 run scoreboard players set @s pollen 1
execute as @a at @s if score @s pollenLeafLitter matches 1 run scoreboard players set @s pollen 1

execute as @a at @s if score @s pollenLeaves matches 0 if score @s pollenShortGrass matches 0 if score @s pollenTallGrass matches 0 if score @s pollenLeafLitter matches 0 run scoreboard players set @s pollen 0
execute as @a at @s if score @s pollen matches 1 run damage @s 0.5 minecraft:generic
execute as @a at @s if score @s pollen matches 1 run particle minecraft:falling_water ~ ~2 ~ .75 .75 .75 0 250 normal

name: Happy Ghast Shoot Fireballs
description: Make It Possible For Happy Ghasts to Shoot Fireballs With Snowballs

blocks.command: execute as @a at @s if entity @e[type=minecraft:happy_ghast,distance=..4] if entity @e[type=snowball,distance=2..4] run summon fireball ^ ^ ^1

execute as @a at @s if entity @e[type=minecraft:happy_ghast,distance=..4] if entity @e[type=fireball,distance=..8] if entity @e[type=snowball,distance=2..4] run data modify entity @e[type=fireball,distance=..8,limit=1] Motion set from entity @e[type=snowball,distance=2..4,limit=1] Motion
execute as @a at @s if entity @e[type=minecraft:happy_ghast,distance=..4] if entity @e[type=snowball,distance=2..4] run playsound minecraft:entity.ghast.warn ambient @a ~ ~ ~
execute as @a at @s if entity @e[type=minecraft:happy_ghast,distance=..4] if entity @e[type=snowball,distance=2..4] run playsound minecraft:entity.ghast.shoot ambient @a ~ ~ ~
execute as @a at @s if entity @e[type=minecraft:happy_ghast,distance=..4] if entity @e[type=snowball,distance=2..4] run kill @e[type=snowball,distance=2..4,limit=1]

name: Lightning Stick
description: A stick that can summon lightning when you hit an entity!

blocks.command: give @p stick[minecraft:custom_data={light:1},minecraft:item_name="Lightning Stick"]
scoreboard objectives add lightningDamage minecraft.custom:minecraft.damage_dealt

execute as @a at @s if entity @s[nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:stick",components:{"minecraft:custom_data":{light:1}}}}] if score @s lightningDamage matches 1.. run execute at @e[nbt={HurtTime:10s},distance=..5,sort=nearest,limit=1] run summon minecraft:lightning_bolt ~ ~ ~
execute as @a at @s if score @s lightningDamage matches 1.. run scoreboard players reset @a

name: Lightning Bow
description: A bow that can shoot lightning arrows!

blocks.command: give @p bow[minecraft:custom_data={light:1},minecraft:item_name="Lightning Bow"]
scoreboard objectives add bow minecraft.used:minecraft.bow

execute as @a at @s if entity @s[nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:bow",components:{"minecraft:custom_data":{light:1}}}}] if score @s bow matches 1.. run tag @e[type=arrow,distance=..2,sort=nearest,limit=1] add lightningArrow
execute as @e[tag=lightningArrow,nbt={inGround:1b}] at @s run summon minecraft:lightning_bolt ~ ~ ~
execute as @e[tag=lightningArrow,nbt={inGround:1b}] at @s run kill @s
execute as @a at @s if score @s bow matches 1.. run scoreboard players reset @s bow

name: Test Multi-Chain Layout
description: A test layout with 6 command blocks across 2 rows.

blocks.command: say Start
say Step 1
say Step 2
say Step 3
say Step 4
say Done
command
command 2
command 3
